    • Method Detail

      • perceive

        public void perceive()
        Method perceive it is made in every tick by the iron agent, because of the scheduler. It perceive the actual uploads, views and complaints of the agents and create a view with them.

      • getPerception

        public ViewTransition getPerception()
        Description copied from interface: Sensor
        Returns the last perception performed by the sensor, which consists of a ViewTransition that contains as many views as it was set in the perception window. For instance, a window of 3 time steps will perceive view streams of 3 views (one (for each time step)
        Specified by:
        getPerception in interface Sensor
        Returns:
        a ViewTransition that contains as many views as it was set in the perception window. For instance, a window of 3 time steps will perceive view streams of 3 views (one (for each time step)
